SvcCatalogCategory.name: SvcCatalogCategory
SvcCatalogCategory.description: Represents a group of Service Catalog items by functional area.

DeveloperName.description: Unique developer name for the catalog item category.

ImageId.description: Allows a builder to pick an image displayed in the catalog.

IsActive.description: Allows service catalog builders to deprecate categories or create in-draft categories.

Language.description: Possible values are: da—Danish de—German en_US—English es—Spanish es_MX—Spanish (Mexico) fi—Finnish fr—French it—Italian ja—Japanese ko—Korean nl_NL—Dutch no—Norwegian pt_BR—Portuguese (Brazil) ru—Russian sv—Swedish th—Thai zh_CN—Chinese (Simplified) zh_TW—Chinese (Traditional)

ParentCategoryId.description: Parent category of this category. Allows categories to be grouped up to a max depth of 3.

SortOrder.description: Determines the order that the category is displayed to the end user.
